name: Floor grinded if required by Scarbro
Area clean and clear of foreign object
Mixing using A38 with  sand ratio 1:5
If use A48 mix 20 kg bags with 1.8L water
Check the screed ffully cured before apply waterproofing
Ardex STB to wall and floor junction/ penetration
Setting out tiles according to construction drawing / Site confirmation
Primer applied prior to tiling if its dusty / dirty
Full coverage of tiles with adhesive
Wall tile to correct height and width
Tile lippiness checked and to acceptable standard
Finishing trims & transition bars edge alignment
Adhesive fully cured and clean properly
Grout work properly into all joint
Silicone applied to a acceptable finish
